page.title: 13RECREATION
page.content: {SPORTS, LEISURE, HOBBIES. { {SPORTS :}IN OUR BLOCK WE HAVE A MODERN SPORTS CENTRE CATERING FOR MOST INDOOR SPORTS INCLUDING SWIMMING AND FOR OUTDOOR SPORTS SUCH AS ATHLETICS.THE MAIN SPECTATOR SPORTS ARE FOOTBALL, RUGBY AND CRICKET.BOWLING(INDOOR AND OUT) IS POPULAR. {LEISURE :}GARDENING IS A POPULAR OUTDOOR PASTIME.DANCING,ROLLER SKATING AND ICE SKATING ARE ALSO POPULAR. MOST LEISURE TIME IS SPENT WATCHING T.V. AND VIDEO. {HOBBIES :}COMMON HOBBIES RANGE FROM SWIMMING TO COMPUTERS.JOGGING IS INCREASING IN POPULARITY AND EACH YEAR WE HAVE A GLENROTHES HALF-MARATHON.
